panels.description: Error rate is the percentage of transactions that result in HTTP 5xx response.
Latency P95 means that 95 percent of the requests have a response time of less than the P95 value.
Error rate is the percentage of transactions that result in HTTP 5xx response.
Latency P95 means that 95 percent of the requests have a response time of less than the P95 value.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{job=~"gitops.*", cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"${ns_prod1}", grpc_service!~"gitops.service.v1.AgentApplicationService|tasks.TaskServiceV2", grpc_method!~"PodLogs|Watch|WatchResourceTree|Next|PushResponse"}[5m])))

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="pipeline-service", resource="PipelineResource", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="ng-manager", resource="ServiceResourceV2", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="pipeline-service", resource="InputSetResourcePMS", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="ng-manager", resource="EnvironmentResourceV2", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="pipeline-service", resource=~"ExecutionDetailsResource|PlanExecutionResource", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

links.title: Fetch Execution SubGraph for a Given NodeExecution ID
Get the Input Set YAML used for given Plan Execution

targets.expr: sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="ng-manager", resource="FileStoreResource", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="pipeline-service", resource="NGTriggerResource", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_cvng_resources_responses_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"${ns_prod1}", resource="MonitoredServiceResource", method=~"createDefaultMonitoredService|updateMonitoredService|getMonitoredServiceFromServiceAndEnvironment", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="prod", serviceName="template-service", resource="NGTemplateResource", statusCode=~"5xx"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)
sum by(job) (rate(http_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"${ns_prod1}", job="policy-mgmt", Status=~"5.."}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)
avg(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (Endpoint, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", job="policy-mgmt", namespace=~"${ns_prod1}"}[5m]))))
sum by(job) (rate(trigger_failure_count_total{job=~"pipeline-service.*", environment="prod"}[5m])) OR on() vector(0)
